version_description:
- Added ability to combine
- Added rotational around and attacking ability
- Added dungeon levels
- Added camera shaking on/off function
- Add 2 new type skins
- Minor bug fixes.

Thank you. Always be happy.

- Added ability to combine
- Added rotational around and attacking ability
- Added dungeon levels
- Added camera shaking on/off function
- Add 2 new type skins
- Minor bug fixes.

Thank you. Always be happy.

- Add 6 chapters (remix mode).
- Modify and add rotational mobility balance.
- Add functionality to add open chat links to guilds.
- Adjust the skin's ability.
The ability of the unknown archer will be increased in part.
- The maximum number of reincarnation is adjusted.
Up to 500 to 100 times.
- Minor bug fixes.

Thank you. Always be happy.

- Added battle-pass mode.
- Added 2 types of Halloween skins
- Minor bug fixes.

Hello. This is CookApps 106.

Thank you for playing Archer's Adventure. We are happy to announce the contents of the 13th update!

-7 brand-new chapters
Electric attack theme
50 stages
1 new monster!

-App improvments
User feedback and bug report features added

-Account linking pop up added

-Skin Mass Fusion function added

-Skin Fusion Lock function added

-Guild Buff changed to 24 hours

Thank you.
We hope you enjoy!

Hello. This is CookApps 106.

Thank you for playing Archer's Adventure. We are happy to announce the contents of the 14th update!

1. Debuff system added
-Skill to debuff enemies abilities has been added to sword and spirits.
-Debuff will be added to various other areas in the near future.

Thank you.
We hope you enjoy!

Hello. This is the Archer's Adventure team.

Thank you for playing Archer's Adventure. We are happy to announce the contents of the 16th update!

1. Chapter 8 added
-One new monster type added

2. Chapter, difficulty drop items update
-Some items from crafting materials dropped

3. UI interface update
-Conceptual arrangement so future systems can be added easily

4. Ad-free item update
-Current item is temporarily not available for purchase

Thank you.
We hope you enjoy!

Hello. This is the Archer's Adventure team.
Thank you for playing Archer's Adventure.
We are happy to announce the contents of the 17th update!

1. Added 2 limited character skins for Christmas

2. Japanese and Chinese support

3. Other game stabilization

Thank you.
We hope you enjoy!

Hello. This is the Archer's Adventure team.
Thank you for playing Archer's Adventure.
We are happy to announce the contents of the 18th update!

- Mission Reward System
- Bug fixes.

Thank you.
We hope you enjoy!

[19th update]
- Add a 9th chapter
- Add new obstacles
- Add new abilities
- Game stabilization

[19th update]
- Add a 9th chapter
- Add new obstacles
- Add new abilities
- Game stabilization

[20th + 21st update]
- Add a Spirit blessing System
- Adjust AD removal menu
- Add Normal chapter clear compensation
- Add Weekly missions
- Add a Skin Collection System
- Reopen a Coupon System
- Game stabilization

[22nd update]
- Super Rare Skin Change System
- Magic Circle System
- Game stabilization

[23-24th Update]
- Update 100 unique items
- Update item setting slot system
- Update new crafting system
- Update repeated stage clear reward
- Improve Item information UI
- Re-balance Item drop rate
- Reduce app size(optimization)
- Game stabilization

[25th update]
- Update Boss Raid System
- Update One-Clicked Unequip Button
- Game Stabilization

[26th update]
- System Updates
Easily obtain manufactured items
- Added Replay Function
- Added Gem System
- Added extra Title System
- Added New Ability System
- Adjusted Chapter-specific Ability appearances
- Added Chapter-specific information on Ability appearances
- Added Nickname Change Feature
- Improved Effects
- Other game stabilizations

[27th update]
- Chapter 10 added
1 new monster
3 new abilities
- Enhanced Standard Mode Functions
Ability to select consumable items before game start
Ability to summon and play with one other guild member
- Added Guild Skills
- Guild Ranking Page Added
- Added rights for Deputy Guild Master to use Guild Skills
- Mileage Shop Added
- Other game stabilizations

[27th update]
- Chapter 10 added
1 new monster
3 new abilities

Ability to select consumable items before game start
Ability to summon and play with one other guild member
- Added Guild Skills

- Added rights for Deputy Guild Master to use Guild Skills
- Mileage Shop Added
- Other game stabilizations

[28th update]
- Added attack ability by skin
Melee, Range, Magic, etc.
- Material dungeon added
It's easier to get the crafting materials.
- Real time square system (Beta)
- Build size optimization
- Other game stabilizations

[29th update]
- Territory System [1/4]

- Reorganize existing items
- Change and improve the ability to cause a lag
- Other game stabilizations

We will guide you through the 32nd update.

1. Tower of Infinity added

Always be happy! :)

- Infinite tower balance adjustment

- Event Skin Update
- Increased skin collection ability
- Normalized magic attack and defense issues

- Multi-shot ability's ATK increase
- Other balance adjustments

Thank you.
Always be happy!

Always be happy

Hello. This is Archer's Adventure development team!
We would like to express our deep appreciation to the users who have always enjoyed our game.

We will guide you about the 36th update.

• Add Epic grade items

• Hell difficulty drops epic grade item

• Add Hell difficulty 1st clear reward

• Replacing the existing shop equipment (Dia) box
(Epic grade item appearance, hero grade apperance probability increase)

• Hero grade item advance system
(Detail- information)
- It is not possible to make an epic class item through item fusion
- Unique items cannot be upgraded
(In the future, when making the 2nd unique items, it can be modified)
-Maintain existing abilities, additional abilities, magic stones, and jewelry
-Existing basic ability and additional ability increased as following epic grade
-Additional abilities randomly will be added at the epic grade
-Added the amount of epic magic stone slots and gem slots
-Prefix ability reset

• Daily dungeon 6th added

• Status initialize system added (partially used gold refunded)

• Sprit Element added to spirit power

• Added 6 magic dolls

Thank you.
Always be happy~

We will guide you about the 37th update.

• Modifying the 1st chapter stage 1-10 portrait mode
• Skin Change Improvement
• Add magic doll change
• Add title system contents

Thank you.
Always be happy~

Let us know what's newly updated in the 38th update.

• Early loading process optimization
• Add new missions and modify daily missions
• Event Skin 'Infernal Guardian Anubis' updated
• Royal Battle Pass updated
• Daily mini shop updated
• Hero grade skin Kwanwoo & Black Witch's balance adjustment
• Add skin experience feature

Thank you.
Always be happy! :)

Check announcement for more details

This is the 43rd update guide.
• Magic Stone Combination System
• Increase the maximum floor of Infinite Tower (400 -> 1200 floors)
• Modifying the balance of jewelry production (adjustment of production time)
• Magic doll change (hero change possible)
• Reorganization of mileage store products
• Increase Batland points (to be applied from next season)
• Bug fixes

Thank you.
Always be happy~

44th update notice


Hello. We're Archer Adventure Development Team.
We would like to express deep thank to the users who always enjoy our games.

We will inform you of the 44th update.
• Infinite Tower balance adjustment
(Higher stage's battle balance will be lower than before)
(Equipment drop rate increase)
(Able to drop epic items on higher stage)
(Super reinforcement stones will be dropped on higher stage)* Scheduled
(Enhanced item drop)
(Prefix item drop)
(Exp amount decreased)
• Improve guild skill
(1, 7, and 30 days lasted item added)
• Reorganize the reinforcement system
(Available from +11)
(Can be enhanced with a high probability when using Super Reinforcement Stone)
(Can be used one of two ways up to +20, then only Super reinforcement Stones can be used)
(Location: High-level dungeons, high-level raids, etc.)
• Add option to remove left item drop text
• Add option to make invisible on own projectile
• Add function to pop up equipment sales during chapter play
•Reorganize coupon system and Update new coupon for Christmas
• Bug fixes

Thank you.
Always be happy~

Hello, this is the Archer Development Team.

I would like to thank all the users who always enjoy our game.
This is the 47th update.
• Optimize game loading speed
(30–40% improvement over previous)
• Improved system opening for early users
• Move to the side manual of the zero system button
• Add magic dolls and collections
(Serial-grade Magic Dolls are not changeable / new systems will be updated later)
• Add special magic doll package product
• Christmas events
• Bug fixes

Hello, this is the Archer Development Team.

I would like to thank all the users who always enjoy our game
This is the 48th update
• Super Enhancement Stone available value reduced from +14 -> +13
• Added New Year 2021 event system
• Increased quantity of +2 reinforced stone acquisition
• Added First item drop system
• Bug fixes

I will inform you of the 49th update.
• Add free box system
• Adjustment of offline compensation ratios
• Offline CompensationAdvertising Diamond Mixing Use
·Fivefold reward ad schedule used in the results window
• Replacement of merchandise deleted from advertising
• Bug fixes

Announcement of the 50th update
- Add bulk production
- Composition, sale, and decomposition epic grading added
- (Advertising) Additional gold acquisition for 10 times in a village.
- Add main menu roulette event
- Added Stage Progress Compensation (1 chapter)
- Fixing and fixing bugs

- Add bulk production
